name: Marbled Moors
description:
Marbled Moors is a short puzzle game about death, actualization, and the path to paradise. Traverse purgatory and become your best self. Take your time, after all you have eternity ahead of you.

There will be a post jam version. This is what was completed within the jam time limit. Please check back in a week for the full version.

Controls: 

F4 - Fullscreen

Arrow keys/Click screen - Move

Enter/Click - Interact

Written by ATinySloth/Holly McCrea

Art and programming by Hellpug/Emily Lampson

Music and sounds by Scott F. Thompson

Singing by Rachel Ransom

Song "Marbled Moors "  Sung by Rachel Ransom, written by ATinySloth, melody/tune by Scott F. Thompson
